casebody.data:
Friday, May 23, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

96-1886. Toledo v. Pub. Util. Comm.

Public Utilities Commission, Nos. 95-1140-EL-COI and 95-299-EL-AIR. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Public Utilities Commission of Ohio. Upon consideration of the joint motion for a stay of proceedings by city of Toledo and intervening appellees, Cleveland Electric Illuminating Company and Toledo Edison Company,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for a stay of proceedings be, and hereby is, granted.
